Steinhardt Institute for Higher Education Policy News
Steinhardt Institute for Higher Education Policy News

The news pages of the website provide coverage of the Institute's events, coverage from conferences attended by Steinhardt-affiliated individuals, highlights from Steinhardt publications, media coverage related to the Institute, and activities related to Teboho Moja, Stella Flores, and Ann Marcus. Topics researched by the Institute include the affects of globalization on higher education; the influence of collegiate conditions, educational practices, and student experiences on student learning and development; and the stratification of college opportunity for racial and ethnic minorities.
The Steinhardt Institute for Higher Education Policy focuses on research and dialogue related to challenges within colleges and universities.
